title: Loam Pass adds 12 More Bike Parks & Heli-Drop Giveaway
content:
Loam Pass, the multi-bike park annual pass, now has more than 40 parks and shuttle providers on board, giving you tons of spots to ride for one low price.

The 12 latest additions include renowned riding destinations such as Angel Fire Resort, Woodward Park City, Mt. Bachelor, Killington Resort, The Highlands, Spirit Mountain, and more. Check the full list here.

The 2024 Pass starts at $249 with early season pricing and includes entry into a Dream Heli-Biking Giveaway, where you get to shred Moab with a friend, plus Christian Peper as your guide.

The Loam Pass gives you two days/trips per destination, including some of the top resorts, bike parks, and shuttle services across
the country. Itâ€™s like a multi-resort ski pass, but for mountain biking, with additional exclusive perks and discounts on things like rentals, dining, and lodging at some spots.
